text: The National Taitung University Library and Information Center () is the academic library of National Taitung University in Taitung City, Taitung County, Taiwan. ==History== The library was inaugurated on 8 December 2014 after being constructed with a cost of NT$460 million. ==Architecture== The shape of the library resembles a pyramid with elements of mountains and ocean. Its roof is filled with grass. It has a total floor area of 13,000 m2 with 6,500 m2 reading area. ==Awards== * FIABCI World Prix d’Excellence Award for Public Infrastructure Amenities (2019) * Architizer.com one of the eight most special libraries in the world ==See also== * Education in Taiwan ==References== Category:2014 establishments in Taiwan Category:Academic libraries in Taiwan Category:Buildings and structures in Taitung County Category:Libraries established in 2014 Category:National Taitung University
title: National Taitung University Library and Information Center
